translations: v.开玩笑，打趣，戏弄（chaff 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: Yet even you are chaffing at recent demands.
sentences.translation: 然而，即使你是在开玩笑最近要求。

sentences.sentence: It is a chaffing way to say that someone is not so handsome or just ordinary-looking.
sentences.translation: 这是一个开玩笑的说法，形容某人不是那么帅或者仅仅是长相普通而已。

sentences.sentence: (nose blow burn) the inevitable chaffing of the nose due to excessive snot blowing and wiping.
sentences.translation: (拧鼻子擦鼻涕)由于过于频繁地擦鼻涕、擤鼻涕，别人免不了地取笑。
